---
category: news
title: "Machine learning detects seismic activity in noisy cities"
excerpt: "A machine learning algorithm that filters seismic data to remove noise from human activity has been developed by researchers in the US and China. Called the UrbanDenoiser, the algorithm is trained using noise signals found an urban environment as well as earthquake signals detected in a more rural location."
